catList: In this class, the aim is to enable students whose native language is not Turkish to reach a level where they can understand a text containing basic tenses and simple sentence structures with the aid of a dictionary.  Materials intended to cover linguistic structures using a content based approach will be used with a variety of opportunities for reading comprehension and critical evaluation skills.

Basic Turkish I is designed as an introductory course to the Turkish language and aims to help students develop basic level grammar and oral skills and to raise their awareness of processes involved in effective communication.
